thread.section_title: FlightNetwork.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightNetwork.com | www.flightnetwork.com
thread.title: Georgia Dryden

author: Georgia Dryden
title: Georgia Dryden
text:
I called Flight network because I made a mistake. Not only was W.K. (the agent) professional, polite and detail oriented, he helped me correct my mistake, found me a better itinerary, and also a cheaper flight!
He was positive, timely and extremely helpful. He was meticulous in changing the details and as quick as he could be. I will use Flight Network for my future booking now that I know how great they are.
